entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.3°C

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
